name: Evil Spirits
description: Tom and his friends went on vacation on a beautiful tropical island. Where they met a tribe of friendly Aborigines, the leader of the natives told a wonderful story that will change their whole life.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista/7 处理器: AMD Athlon(tm) II X2 240 Processor 2.80 GHz 内存: 3 GB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GT 220 DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 处理器: Quad Core Processor 内存: 4 MB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, GeForce GTX 560 DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
